thread.title: Tony Hawk 5 is delayed on Xbox 360 and PS3, as team fixes PS4 and Xbox One versions - Gaming
thread.title_full: Tony Hawk 5 is delayed on Xbox 360 and PS3, as team fixes PS4 and Xbox One versions - Gaming News - Digital Spy

author: Liam Martin
title: Tony Hawk 5 is delayed on Xbox 360 and PS3, as team fixes PS4 and Xbox One versions - Gaming
text: Perhaps unsurprisingly, Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 5 has been delayed on PS3 and Xbox 360.The Xbox One and PS4 versions launched with a host of bugs and glitches, so Activision has decided to fix those before making the switch to last-gen consoles. Â© Activision / Eurogamer According to Eurogamer, the Xbox 360 and PS3 versions - which were originally pencilled in for November - aren't likely to be released until next year."We are working closely with our developers to address the issues identified by our community," reads an Activision statement. "Our development resources are fully focused on fixes and content updates for PS4 and Xbox One, so we have decided to delay the release of THPS5 on PS3 and X360. "We will update the community when we have more specific information about a release date for PS3 and Xbox 360."Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 5 was accompanied by a massive 7.7GB patch at launch, which is larger than the game itself.Once the game has been fixed, Activision will release a further two levels and five bonus skaters as free DLC.Check out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel. Be sure to subscribe!
